item.title: About
item.description: Teaching psychology at the University of Glasgowâ€™s School of Psychology and Neuroscience. I have completed my PhD under Prof Monika Harvey, Prof Gregor Thut and Dr Gemma Learmonth. My main research interest is the intersection between motivation and attention and their effects on performance. During my PhD, I contributed to research using electroencephalography (EEG) to detect biomarkers associated with mechanisms involved in fatigue. I also investigated the role of ageing in sustained attention.
